message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy our gains.
Let's meet in the middle, Alice! We both deserve a fair share.
I'm being very fair, Bob. Consider the time pressure and the fact that this is my last offer above 700,000.
Alice, you're running out of time! Inflation is eating away at your share. Be smart and take this offer before it's too late.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. The clock is ticking.
Alice, it's time to get real. Inflation is killing your share, and you're running out of options. Take this 50/50 split and let's end this game before you lose even more.
